attributes.action: Prioritise vaccinations for all frontline public services payed or volunteer.
attributes.additional_details: all these services and more have equal value and importance to keep the people of this country safe and are at the highest risk of spreading the virus and need to be protected equally.
attributes.background: Prioritise COVID vaccinations for all frontline public services  payed or volunteer (Ambulance, Fire, Police, Prison, Coastguard,RNLI, Military, etc).
